## Checklist

- [ ] Lints/Tests pass locally (`npm run check`, `npm run test`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No secrets committed
- [ ] No unnecessary complexity (keep components/utils focused; see `docs/code-health-strategy.md`)
